### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17502](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17502.html) (test: add unit test for non-standard bare m
Would it be easier to just make a new transaction, make the vin size large enough to just break the size, rather than using an arbitrarily large number?
Sure. Completely new transaction object or reset the existing one to the default values?

Hi @KaanKC, thanks for your pull request!
> Sure. Completely new transaction object or reset the existing one to the default values?

There is no need for a completely new object, you can just reuse the existing one (`CMutableTransaction t`) which also used for all other thests in the same function-- first reset it, then resize `t.vin` to a size where it passes and then fails. Your second co
Is anyone still working on this?
> Is anyone still working on this?\n\nSince this PR's author doesn't seem to be working on the unit test anymore, I created a new PR: #17947.
Going to close in favour of #17947.
